entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: DisabledAbel/M3U-playlist-porxy: M3U Playlist Proxy is a lightweight server that lets you stream, customize, and manage IPTV M3U playlists with ease. Whether you're cleaning up bloated channel lists, adding authentication to protect your stream, or just want a better way to serve your playlists — this tool gives you full control. With built-in support for filtering, and more
entry.content: M3U Playlist Proxy is a lightweight server that lets you stream, customize, and manage IPTV M3U playlists with ease. Whether you're cleaning up bloated channel lists, adding authentication to protect your stream, or just want a better way to serve your playlists — this tool gives you full control. With built-in support for filtering, and more

entry.title: ericwastaken/docker-rabbitmq-connectivity-verifier: A lightweight, containerized Node.js tool to verify RabbitMQ connectivity. It connects to your server, creates a test exchange and queue, and sends a test message—ideal for validating credentials, TLS setup, and network access. Just configure your secrets and run with Docker Compose.
entry.content: A lightweight, containerized Node.js tool to verify RabbitMQ connectivity. It connects to your server, creates a test exchange and queue, and sends a test message—ideal for validating credentials, TLS setup, and network access. Just configure your secrets and run with Docker Compose.

entry.title: karimz1/imgcompress: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization—resizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.
entry.content: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization—resizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.
